_defaultHeaderTitle.comment: Default header title in LMS integration.
_go_to_teams.comment: Button action text when the user wants to go to the main teams client
emptyStatePrimaryErrorMessage: You have not been added to a team on this course yet.
_emptyStatePrimaryErrorMessage.comment: Primary message shown when there are no teams for the course
educatorEmptyStateSecondaryErrorMessage: Your IT administrator needs to create a team, add you as a member and link it to your course on your behalf. Try contacting your IT administrator for help.
_educatorEmptyStateSecondaryErrorMessage: Secondary message shown to an educator when there are no teams for the course
genericEmptyStateSecondaryErrorMessage: While you wait, you can use Teams to contact others at your school, organize clubs, and more.
Secondary message shown to a non-educator when there are no teams for the course
_learnMoreAboutTeams.comment: Message of the link that will open resources to learn more about Teams for Education
_launchTeamsButton.comment: Text for button which user will click on to launch Teams
problemConnectingCourseToTeamErrorMessag: There was a problem connecting your course to Microsoft Teams
_problemConnectingCourseToTeamErrorMessa: Primary error message when a course in the Learning Management System (LMS) cannot be connected to a team
problemCreatingTeamForCourse: There was a problem creating your team
_problemCreatingTeamForCourse.comment: Primary error message when team sync for a course fails
invalidLicenseTypeErrorMessage: You need an educator or student license to use Teams for Education. Try asking your IT administrator to assign the correct license to you.
_invalidLicenseTypeErrorMessage.comment: Secondary error message when user does not have the required education license
invalidUserRoleErrorMessage: It looks like you have not been added to this course. Try asking your IT administrator or teacher to add you to this course.
_invalidUserRoleErrorMessage.comment: Secondary error message when user has not been added to this course.
experienceDisabledErrorMessage: It looks like your account {{email}} is not set up to use Teams. Did you mean to sign in with a different Microsoft account?
_experienceDisabledErrorMessage.comment: Secondary error message when user does not have access to the experience when feature flag is disabled. {{email}} is a placeholder for the user's email.
experienceDisabledErrorMessageNoEmail: It looks like your account is not set up to use Teams. Did you mean to sign in with a different Microsoft account?
_experienceDisabledErrorMessageNoEmail.c: Secondary error message when user does not have access to the experience when feature flag is disabled.
unsupportedLmsErrorMessage: Unfortunately this learning tool does not support Teams for Education. Try contacting your IT administrator for help.
_unsupportedLmsErrorMessage.comment: Secondary error message when user launches the experience from an unsupported 3rd party learning tool
_genericErrorMessage.comment: Secondary error message for generic errors
_backgoundImageMessage.comment: Accessibility text to announce that there is a background image
teamCardMessage: List {{cardNumber}} of {{totalCards}}, {{name}} team, tap to open team in a separate tab
_teamCardMessage.comment: Accessibility text to announce when user is on a team card. {{cardNumber}}, {{totalCards}}, and {{name}} are place holders to describe the card position and team name.
_moreOptionsMessage.comment: Aria label for a button that shows a popup with the options for the teams header
_thirdPartyNoticeMessage.comment: A link to a text file with licenses for all third party software used in the experience
_logOutMessage.comment: Action link to sign out user from teams
_courseCalendarHeaderTitle.comment: Header title in LMS integration course calendar app
_addNewMeeting.comment: Action button to launch scheduling form and create a new meeting in the lms course calendar app.
_addEntireClassButton.comment: Text button content to add entire class
_addEntireClassRetryButton.comment: Text button asking user to retry adding class post failure
_addEntireClassGenericError.comment: Generic error message displayed when add entire class fails
addEntireClassSizeLimitError: We couldn't add the class. It has too many people to be added all at once.
_addEntireClassSizeLimitError.comment: Error message displayed when user attempts to add class whose size greater than currently supported.
addEntireClassConfigError: We couldn't add the class. We had trouble getting the class information.
_addEntireClassConfigError.comment: Error message displayed when add entire class fails due to the meeting creator not owning any (members/owners/groups) for a given course id
_addParticipantsInProgressTitle.comment: Title to display when entire class is being added in the scheduling form
addParticipantsInProgressMessage: This may take a moment. This window will automatically close when the entire class is added. Cancel to add participants manually instead
_addParticipantsInProgressMessage.commen: Message to display when entire class is being added in the scheduling form
_addParticipantsInProgressCancelAction.c: Action button to cancel the addition of entire class to the scheduling form while in progress
replaceAttendeesWithEntireClassConfirmat: Replace attendees with the entire class?
_replaceAttendeesWithEntireClassConfirma: Title for confirmation before over riding the existing attendees in a meeting with entire class
replaceAttendeesWithEntireClassConfirmat: People you have already added to the invite will be removed when you add the class. You can add them again later.
_replaceAttendeesWithEntireClassConfirma: Message explaining consequences of overriding existing attendees with entire class
_reportProblem.comment: Button action text when the user wants to report a problem to EDU support.
